price: Реци: “Путујте по свету и видите како су завршили грешници!”
arabic: قُلۡ سِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَٱنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qul sīrū fī al-arḍi fa-unẓurū kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu al-muj'rimīna
